Conveyor_Belt_Problems.step: Check conveyor belt tension - should have 5-10mm deflection when pressed
Inspect belt for wear, cracks, or foreign objects
Verify motor coupling alignment using dial indicator
Lubricate conveyor bearings with specified grease (every 500 hours)
Check belt tracking - adjust tracking rollers if belt drifts

Fixture_Alignment_Error.step: Run automatic fixture alignment routine from HMI menu
Check fixture mounting bolts for looseness (torque: 25 N⋅m)
Verify reference pins are clean and undamaged
Use precision gauge to check fixture dimensions against drawing
Recalibrate fixture position using laser measurement system

Motor_Drive_Alarm.step: Check drive display for fault code - refer to fault code table
Common codes: F001=Overcurrent, F002=Overvoltage, F003=Motor overload
Check motor connections at terminal block for loose wires
Reset drive after clearing fault cause: Hold RESET button for 3 seconds

Encoder_Signal_Loss.step: Check encoder cable connections - ensure proper shielding
Measure encoder supply voltage: should be 5V ±0.25V
Test encoder signals with oscilloscope - A, B, Z channels
Clean encoder disk if contaminated with dust or oil
Replace encoder if mechanical damage is detected

Camera_Focus_Issues.step: Check camera lens for dust, fingerprints, or scratches
Run auto-focus calibration routine from vision software
Adjust camera height: optimal distance is 150mm from target
Verify LED ring light intensity - should be 80% brightness
Update camera firmware if focus hunting occurs

Image_Processing_Timeout.step: Check CPU usage during image processing - should be <70%
Increase processing timeout in vision software settings (current: 5 seconds)
Optimize image processing algorithms - use ROI to reduce processing area
Add more RAM if memory usage exceeds 8GB during operation

Humidity_Control_Fault.step: Check humidity sensor reading - should be 45±5% RH
Inspect dehumidifier operation - check water collection tank
Clean humidity sensor with isopropyl alcohol
Verify HVAC system operation - check air flow rate
Calibrate humidity controller using certified reference standard

Vibration_Isolation_Problem.step: Check anti-vibration mounts for wear or deflection
Measure vibration levels using accelerometer - should be <0.1g RMS
Inspect foundation for cracks or settling
Verify equipment isolation from building vibrations

ADC_Noise_Issues.step: Check ground connections - ensure single point grounding
Measure noise floor with inputs shorted - should be <10μV RMS
Verify shield connections on all analog cables
Use twisted pair cables for differential signals
Add ferrite cores to cables if EMI interference suspected

Sampling_Rate_Error.step: Check ADC sampling configuration - current rate: 100kS/s
Verify anti-aliasing filter settings - cutoff at 40kHz
Monitor CPU load during high-speed acquisition
Use DMA for data transfer to reduce CPU overhead

Quality_Control_Issues.step: Verify test limits are within specification tolerance
Check measurement repeatability - perform 10 consecutive measurements
Validate test correlation with reference measurements
Review statistical process control charts for trends
Update test specifications if product design has changed

Maintenance_Reminders.step: Daily: Check consumables levels (contact probes, test fixtures)
Weekly: Clean vision system lenses and LED illumination
Monthly: Calibrate measurement instruments and update certificates
Quarterly: Perform mechanical alignment checks and adjustments
Annually: Complete preventive maintenance per schedule PM-ATE3-001
